title: Understanding the Question
text: To determine if 3% of people commute $$3$$ miles, check the data for the number of people commuting $$3$$ miles and compare it to the total surveyed.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: If $$2$$ out of $$100$$ people commute $$3$$ miles, what percentage is that?

title: Compare the Values
text: Compare the calculated percentage with 3% to determine if the statement is true or false.
